bibl.title: Not Comedy, but Epigram: 'Mr. Perfect' in fr. com. adesp. *1036.
bibl.note: Revised and expanded version of an appendix to E. Stigka's Cambridge dissertation (2006). - P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 307 verso, I, 30-II, 3 (= Pack2 1698) = C.G.F.P. 300 (a) = P.C.G. VIII, *1036. Critical notes and general interpretation. Present the fragment (composed in iambics) as 'epigrammatic' (not 'comic').
AUSTIN Colin and Efrosyni STIGKA, Not Comedy, but Epigram: 'Mr. Perfect' in fr. com. adesp. *1036.
